query:
CREATE TABLE student_specializations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  specialization ENUM('code_warrior', 'interface_master', 'data_sage', 'system_architect') NOT NULL,
  chosenAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  level INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute CREATE TABLE student_specializations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  specialization ENUM('code_warrior', 'interface_master', 'data_sage', 'system_architect') NOT NULL,
  chosenAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  level INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
